name: Vivek Bhojwani
about: Vivek has > 35 years of work experience. He is Founder of StartUp Consulting India has impacted 100+ StartUps (In Funding, Business Growth, Consulting). Contact Vivek for StartUp Consulting and Funding. Looking for SAAS, IoT, ESG, EV Enablers, B2B Tech StartUps Send an email on vivekbhojwani14@gmail.com

experience.title: Senior Business Analyst
experience.description: Team Management and Business Analysis, leading a team of US property researchers / analysts at CoreBrix India, managing a team of analysts to support the Real Estate Capital Markets (RECM) division of Wachovia Bank, North Carolina, USA. Documented the functional requirements at a project at Charlotte, North Carolina, for a new version of FirstVision, a project that captured real estate transaction flows for Wachovia Bank RECM, interfacing with over several RECM Servicing team members and guidance from Senior Management of Wachovia RECM (Now Wells Fargo)
